settings.py¶

Settings for adjusting and configuring Hylaa functionalities.

class hylaa.settings.HylaaSettings(step_size, max_time)¶

Class enveloping Hylaa global settings

aggstrat = None¶

aggregation strategy class

do_guard_strengthening = None¶

add invariants of target modes to each guard?

make_counterexample = None¶

save counter-example to data structure / file?

optimize_tt_transitions = None¶

auto-detect time-triggered transitions and use single-step semantics?

process_urgent_guards = None¶

allow zero continuous-post steps between transitions?

random_seed = None¶

for deterministic random numbers (simulations / color selection)

stdout_colors = None¶

colors for each level of printing

step_size = None¶

simulation step size

stop_on_aggregated_error = None¶

stop whenever any state (aggregated or not) reaches an error mode

stop_on_concrete_error = None¶

stop whenver a concrete state reaches an error

class hylaa.settings.LabelSettings¶

Settings for labels such as plot title, plot font size, ect.

big(size=30)¶

increase sizes of labels

turn_off()¶

turn off plot labels

class hylaa.settings.PlotSettings¶

plot settings container

hylaa
